description: Kick and glide through winter. The X-Tour Venture AR Jr. is an on-trail touring ski for juniors with a traditional XC feel. A durable wood and air-channel core keeps it light, while our waxless AR Plus base offers for a good blend of grip and glide with no prep required. Traditional length sizing offers increased glide. The ski is compatible with the Turnamic® binding system for unparalleled snow feel.<br><br>Easy Kick and Glide<br>Waxless AR PLUS base features a negative-cut kick surface for the perfect blend of grip and glide in all snow conditions<br><br>Easy Handling<br>Active Cap offers a balance of torsional rigidity and supple flex from tip to tail for all conditions control<br><br>Stable<br>Medium sidecut offers the stability for on- or off-track skiing<br><br>Light and Durable<br>Wood air core offers durable off-trail performance with air channels for reduced weight
name: XT Venture JR WL Short SI - With Binding - Junior
